title: scripting engines
extract: A scripting engine is commonly defined as a vehicle for implementing scripts in scripting languages. ... A scripting engine is like an interpreter that turns script (code snippets directed at performing certain task) into machine code on the fly i.e. at the execution time.
extract_html: A scripting engine is commonly defined as a vehicle for implementing scripts in scripting languages. ... A scripting engine is like an interpreter that turns script (code snippets directed at performing certain task) into machine code on the fly i.e. at the execution time.
